title: On a Journey
description: “A pair of friends circle the globe in this picture book tribute to the transformative effect of leaving home....a worthwhile...message about enjoying life’s journey.” - School Library Journal “Are you sitting comfortably?” Hedgehog asked? “Please put your seatbelt on.” Frog nodded and fastened his seatbelt. His friend started te car. “Here we go,” he said, “wave goodbye.” A heartwarming picture book about traveling together, sharing new experiences, and letting yourself be amazed by the world around you. For everyone ages 4 and up.
author: Guido Van Genechten
